mapper.select: select distinct pop.* from pop, product where pop.sno = product.sno order by pop.sno
select product.*, pop.sname from product, pop where product.sno = pop.sno
select review.*, member.mid from review, member where review.mno = member.mno and pno = #{pno} order by rno desc
mapper.insert: insert into review (rno, pno, mno, rcon, rdate, rgrade) values(rno_seq.nextval, #{pno}, #{mno}, #{rcon}, sysdate, #{rgrade})
mapper.update: update review set rcon = #{rcon}, rdate = sysdate, rgrade = #{rgrade} where rno = #{rno}
